nodes.text: Bisk was a stormtrooper of the Galactic Empire. By the time of the Iron Blockade, Bisk was stationed at an Imperial outpost on Nar Hypa, serving as a taskmaster. During the blockade, Bisk confronted a young smuggler who had come to steal medical supplies from the outpost on "Happy" Dapp's behalf. The taskmaster was ultimately killed by the scoundrel.
Taskmaster Bisk first appeared in the 2015 mobile game Star Wars: Uprising. He or she was the end boss of the story mission "The First of Four."
